September 29, 2020
mc268
The dial is decent, but I’m not the biggest fan. It’s very efficient for the cost, but I’m used to Spidey having indom and move an attack now. I’m not used to Peter being unable to do something half the time, or dying in one hit. A good dial, and full of flavour, but not for me, I’d rather play the SR, or Peter Parker from this set.

spideyguy51
Having the codex keyword means that I can have Spider-Man and the Silver Surfer together on a named theme team besides Fantastic Four. I am very interested to see who else gets the Codex keyword in this set.
